name: UMED PARIWAR

address: Near Kanifnath Temple , Off Hadapsar Saswad Road

briefDescription: Umed Pariwar,a Parents organization established in 1990 in Pune, is working exclusively for rehabilitation of Intellectually development disabled[IDD] persons.We have been conducting Bi-annual state level conference pertaining to this subject, annual drawing competition,Dance &drama competitionfor students of special schools. The objective is to provide able support group for these IDD persons and a platform to sensitize the society to meet the special needs of the differently abled. We are involved in mentoring, training and retraining their special wards to contribute their best and be an acceptable and functional member of the society. We are running “Arvind Saurabh “ a rehabilitation cum residential facility for IDD persons.
